name: .ASVX
summary: Learn about .ASVX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an ASVX file with with MakeMusic Finale (Windows, Mac). To do so, select File → Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your ASVX file.
After you open your ASVX file, you can use the File → Save As... option to save the file as a normal MUSX file.
You can use MakeMusic Finale to export the score an ASVX file contains in the following formats:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .asvx file in MakeMusic Finale
images.caption: ASVX file open in MakeMusic Finale
